title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 99 - VALUATION OF ANNUITY, SINGLE PREMIUM LIFE INSURANCE, GUARANTEED INTEREST CONTRACT AND OTHER DEPOSIT RESERVES
